name: Out of Controls (SLotman)
description:
Made for GMTK GameJam 2020.

Get the hero to the exit. Simple, right?

This is a game about accessibility. Made by a single person.

Follow Icon Games on Facebook: https://fb.me/Icongames
or on Twitter: https://twitter.com/icongames

This game won''t work on mobile, because it needs an actual keyboard for player  movement. Sorry!
